Producer: Bryan Demore, Anthony Shim, Rebecca Steele
Production Co: Téléfilm Canada, Lonesome Heroes Productions, A Lasting Dose Productions, Kind Stranger Productions, September Films, Crave, The Harold Greenberg Fund
Synopsis: Set in the 90s, a Korean single mother raises her young son in the suburbs of Canada determined to provide a better life for him than the one she left behind.
Title: Riceboy Sleeps
